quote: Future is one of the wildest experiences that you will ever have.
author: J.T.Abraham

quote: The future belongs to those who believe in the beauty of their dreams.
author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quote: The best way to predict your future is to create it
author: Abraham Lincoln

quote: I figured something out. The future is unpredictable.
author: John Green,  An Abundance of Katherines

quote: The future belongs to those who enhance their level of consciousness and awareness everyday.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: The future is something which everyone reaches at the rate of sixty minutes an hour, whatever he does, whoever he is.
author: C.S. Lewis

quote: The future never happens; there will always be a future.
author: Stephen Richards

quote: The future depends on what you do today.
author: Mahatma Gandhi

quote: When all else is lost, the future still remains.
author: Christian Bovee

quote: On the other hand, if the future is not the one you chose then you may have to use your willpower to obtain the future of your liking.
author: Stephen Richards,  Think Your way to Success: Let Your Dreams Run Free

quote: The future reshapes the memory of the past in the way it recalibrates significance: some episodes are advanced, others lose purchase.
author: Gregory Maguire,  A Lion Among Men

quote: Imagining the future is a kind of nostalgia. (...) You spend your whole life stuck in the labyrinth, thinking about how you'll escape it one day, and how awesome it will be, and imagining that future keeps you going, but you never do it. You just use the future to escape the present.
author: John Green,  Looking for Alaska

quote: Past and future is determined by what is now…right now! This is why the present is a gift; the only one that ultimately matters most.
author: T.F. Hodge,  From Within I Rise: Spiritual Triumph Over Death and Conscious Encounters with "The Divine Presence"

quote: Creating a better futureRequires creativity in the present.
author: Matthew Goldfinger

quote: When you make a choice, you change the future.
author: Deepak Chopra

quote: Always choose the future over the past. What do we do now?
author: Brian Tracy

quote: learn from the past live in the present plan for the future
author: Audrey Farrell

quote: There is no future without a past, because what is to be cannot be imagined except as a form of repetition.
author: Siri Hustvedt,  The Summer Without Men

quote: The Futures Bright, Wear Your Sunglasses
author: Ian Somerhalder

quote: Life has become the future. Every moment of your life is lived for the future.
author: John Green,  Paper Towns

quote: I don’t live in either my past or my future. I’m interested only in the present. If you can concentrate always on the present, you’ll be a happy man. Life will be a party for you, a grand festival, because life is the moment we’re living now.
author: Paulo Coelho,  The Alchemist

quote: We have to know the truth about the past to discover out future.
author: Patti Callahan Henry,  Between the Tides

quote: Your future is only as bright as your mind is open.
author: Rich Wilkins

quote: The future is now. It's time to grow up and be strong. Tomorrow may well be too late.
author: Neil LaBute,  Reasons to Be Pretty

quote: The future is uncertain, but that can be a good thing.
author: Jennifer Niven,  All the Bright Places

quote: Let us make our future now, and let us make our dreams tomorrow's reality.
author: Malala Yousafzai

quote: The future for me is already a thing of the past -You were my first love and you will be my last
author: Bob Dylan,  Bob Dylan - Love and Theft: Piano/Vocal/Guitar

quote: Watch for the thing that will show itself to you. Because that thing, when you find it, will be your future.
author: Arthur Golden,  Memoirs of a Geisha

quote: In the Future [1]: (criminals) In the future we're going to find a wayto turn criminals into wordsand then place them in parentheses.
author: Beryl Dov

quote: We hold the future still timidly, but perceive it for the first time as a function of our own action.
author: J.D. Bernal,  The World, the Flesh & the Devil;: An Enquiry into the Future of the Three Enemies of the Rational Soul

quote: Nobody can predict the future. You just have to give your all to the relationship you're in and do your best to take care of your partner, communicate and give them every last drop of love you have. I think one of the most important things in a relationship is caring for your significant other through good times and bad.
author: Nick Cannon

quote: You spend your whole life stuck in the labyrinth, thinking about how you'll escape one day, and how awesome it will be, and imagining that future keeps you going, but you never do it. You just use the future to escape the present.
author: John Green,  Looking for Alaska

quote: To design the future effectively, you must first let go of your past.
author: Charles J. Givens

quote: The future will be what it will, and fretting about it will only make your fears more likely to come true.
author: Christopher Paolini,  Inheritance

quote: Live in the present, remember the past, and fear not the future, for it doesn't exist and never shall. There is only now.
author: Christopher Paolini,  Eldest

quote: Never let the future disturb you. You will meet it, if you have to, with the same weapons of reason which today arm you against the present.
author: Marcus Aurelius,  Meditations

quote: The future is meant for those who are willing to let go of the worst parts of the past. When you cannot take two steps without turning around to inspect your footsteps, you are getting nowhere fast.
author: Corey Taylor,  Seven Deadly Sins: Settling the Argument Between Born Bad and Damaged Good

quote: There is nothing like a dream to create the future.
author: Victor Hugo,  Les Misérables

quote: ...we have to surpass ourselves every day, make every day undying. Climb our own personal Everest and do it in such a way that every step is a little bit of eternity. That's what the future is for: to build the present, with real plans, made by living people.
author: Muriel Barbery

quote: The future was one thing that could never be broken, because it had not yet had the chance to be anything.
author: Sarah Dessen,  Saint Anything

quote: Only you can control your future.
author: Dr. Seuss

quote: We may be living past and future lives at the same time we are living this one.
author: Doug Dillon

quote: Prediction is very difficult, especially about the future.
author: Niels Bohr

quote: You can't stop the futureYou can't rewind the pastThe only way to learn the secret...is to press play.
author: Jay Asher,  Thirteen Reasons Why

quote: Time Traveler's Ennui The future ain't what it use to be.
author: Beryl Dov

quote: Anyone who fights for the future, lives in it today.
author: Ayn Rand

quote: Would you like to know your future?If your answer is yes, think again. Not knowing is the greatest life motivator.So enjoy, endure, survive each moment as it comes to you in its proper sequence -- a surprise.
author: Vera Nazarian,  The Perpetual Calendar of Inspiration

quote: Keep your eyes on the future, because that's where the answers are. It's where the hope is.
author: Holly Cupala,  Tell Me a Secret

quote: Its more fun to think of the future than dwell on the past.
author: Sara Shepard,  Unbelievable

quote: Life is a series of collisions with the future; it is not the sum of what we have been, but what we yearn to be.
author: Jose Ortega y Gasset
